amendment.description: To improve authorities to address urgent nonproliferation crises and United States Nonproliferation operations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4285 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4285 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Lugar. (consideration: CR S5933-5937; text: CR S5936) To improve authorities to address urgent nonproliferation crises and United States Nonproliferation operations.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4285 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Lugar.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4285 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
